titles.title: Nagagutsu o Haita Neko: 80 Nichikan Sekai Isshuu
Puss in Boots 3: Puss in Boots travels Around the World in 80 Days
Puss-in-Boots: Travels Around the World in 80 Days
長靴をはいた猫 80日間世界一周
Der gestiefelte Kater reist um die Welt
Il gatto con gli stivali in giro per il mondo
Кругосветное путешествие Кота в сапогах
Podróż Kota w Butach
Kocour v botách 2: Cesta kolem světa
Τα μαγικά Ταξείδια του Παπουτσωμένου Γάτου
Csizmás Kandúr: A Világ Körül
Batuoto katino kelionė aplink Pasaulį

anime.description: Brave cat Pero once had a bet with treacherous multimillionarie Grumon that he can travel around the world in 80 days. The stake is high, in case of success Grumon will give all of his fortune to Pero, but in case of failure Pero becomes slave of Grumon for the rest of his life. Pero departs together with his faithful friends behemoth Kato and brave Small Mouse. Grumon tries everything to prevent their arrival to the finish. Source: sharereactor.ru
